## Workshop Materials

### Prerequisites
- Laptop with administrative privileges
- Basic command-line experience recommended
- Molecular biology background helpful

### Software Installation
Complete [Module 0 Installation Guide](module-0/installation.qmd) before the workshop begins.

### Datasets
All datasets will be provided via cloud storage and local servers during the workshop.
